name: The Trench (itch) (OmarChapa85)
description:
The Trench is a short horror experience in which you will command the Pandora submarine, exploring the depths of a trench that has been uncovered after an earthquake in the Pacific Ocean, your mission will be to retrieve all the data from a previous accident involving another submarine, "The Neptune".

The game is a first person game where you can control a submarine and also walk in some areas.

The inspiration for this experience comes from stories from H.P. Lovecraft and Cloverfield.

This is version 0.9 of the game, we are releasing version 1.0 soon that will include support for more languages, more platforms including Mac and Linux and any feedback from version 0.9

If you buy version 0.9 you will receive version 1.0 and any version after for free.
